group_1.textRight: I see, so Ayame's team too.
You're also sharing info with the Kamihama @Magia Union.

group_1.textLeft: and I heard Felicia was also hurt...
Kaede's team, too... Some of them were @carried to the hospital...
It feels like...things are getting worse and worse...
...Could we...continue with what we were talking @about...?

group_1.textRight: ...You mean about the Kamihama Magia Union?
...I'm also...not sure if it's a good idea, but...
But, Konoha is...
So sure that the Kamihama Magia Union is being, @targeted,
that she said she doesn't want us to get involved @with them...

group_1.textLeft: Us too. My team won't as our policy...

group_1.textRight: We're gonna meet up tomorrow, but...
I doubt we'll be able to change Nanaka's mind...
Felicia...she's weaker than me...
So if she got attacked again...

group_1.textLeft: If you say it like that, we're going to get into a fight @again...

group_1.textRight: Well I'm not worried about her 'cause we're not @friends!
Felicia's just so unreliable...!
...I'm worried too.
Everyone in the counseling office, and all the girls I @hang out with...
They're all a part of the Kamihama Magia Union...
That's why I've been thinking about this ever since @we got that information.
There's a good chance that my friends are all being @targeted,
and I'm sitting here on the outside doing nothing, @wondering if this is okay...
...I'm going to go talk to Nanaka again tomorrow.

group_1.narration: "I want to ask if I can join the Kamihama Magia Union, @not as a team, but as an individual."

group_1.textRight: That's what I'm thinking...!
By joining the Kamihama Magia Union,
I think I can help everyone,
by being the bridge between them and our team.
